code: import React,{useState}from'react';import axios from'axios';import{useParams}from'react-router-dom';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function AddDzialanie(){const{obszarId}=useParams();const[dzialanie,setDzialanie]=useState({opis:'',czas:''});const handleSubmit=event=>{event.preventDefault();axios.post("api/dzialania/".concat(obszarId,"/dzialanie"),dzialanie).then(()=>alert('Action added successfully!')).catch(error=>console.error('Error adding action',error));};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"container mt-3",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:"Add Action"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{onSubmit:handleSubmit,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"mb-3",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("label",{htmlFor:"opis",className:"form-label",children:"Description"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",className:"form-control",id:"opis",value:dzialanie.opis,onChange:e=>setDzialanie({...dzialanie,opis:e.target.value})})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"mb-3",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("label",{htmlFor:"czas",className:"form-label",children:"Planned Time"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"number",className:"form-control",id:"czas",value:dzialanie.czas,onChange:e=>setDzialanie({...dzialanie,czas:e.target.value})})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{type:"submit",className:"btn btn-primary",children:"Add"})]})]});}export default AddDzialanie;
